column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Zuko says : " Uncle !
#Text=He busted himself out .
#Text=I 've never seen anything like it , he was like a one - man army !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Try and find cover !
#Text=I think we 're about to see some bombs !
#Text=" Katara says : " Why are n't they turning around to attack us again ?
#Text=" Aang says : " They 're heading for the beach ... They 're gon na destroy the submarines !
#Text=" Sokka says : " How are we all going to escape ?
#Text=" Hakoda says : " We 're not .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Then our only choice is to stand and fight .
#Text=We have the Avatar , we could still win .
#Text=" Hakoda says : " Yes , with the Avatar we could still win .
#Text=On another day .
#Text=You kids have to leave .
#Text=You have to escape on Appa together .
#Text=" Katara says : " What ?
#Text=We ca n't leave you behind !
#Text=We wo n't leave anyone behind !
#Text=" Hakoda says : " You 're our only chance in the long run .
#Text=You and Sokka have to go with Aang somewhere safe .
#Text=It 's the only way to keep hope alive .
#Text=" Bato says : " The youngest of our group should go with you .
#Text=The adults will stay behind and surrender .
#Text=We 'll be prisoners , but we 'll all survive this battle .
#Text=" Tyro says : " I 've got some experience with the Fire Nation prisons .
#Text=It 's not going to be easy , but we 'll get by .
#Text=" Sokka says : " They 're at the beach already !
#Text="
